title: Lemon Tree Mediterranean Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Mediterranean, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service Mediterranean food where you pick your toppings to go on bowl, sandwich, or salad. Vegans could get grilled vegetables or falafel; sides like tabouleh, carrot salad, purple cabbage, hummus, lentil soup; plus add-ons like sliced tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, kalamata olives.
